attributes.action: Amend  the current disability legislation to make it compulsory for theatres and other entertainment  centres to install full modern Induction loops for the hard of hearing in all parts of the cinema.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In many theaters  they do not do this  so the benefit  of modern hearing aids is lost. Instead they supply large unwieldy equipment  so that you just as well have a sign round your neck saying  disabled.
